subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginóbili scored a season-high 40 points, including 24 in a row for San Antonio in the first half, and Tim Duncan had 30 last night to help the Spurs defeat the host Atlanta Hawks, 103-96.
snippet: Manu Ginóbili scored a season-high 40 points, including 24 in a row for San Antonio in the first half, and Tim Duncan had 30 last night to help the Spurs defeat the host Atlanta Hawks, 103-96.
